channel.title: I Need Some Help Hosting a Private Server
channel.description:
Hey, I have been working on hosting a private server, this is what I need:
The source is working (N0vascape) but to log in from my computer I have to set the ip for 0.0.0.0, how do I set it up to work with my no-ip account?
(yes, I have no-ip set up...)
Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 09, 2006, 09:48:36 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.title: I Need Some Help Hosting a Private Server
item.dc:creator: @nov9862 nov9862
item.description:
@nov9862 wrote:

OK, why not ill help, first of all if i help yo do i get admin…
second of all your words are confusing please reword for more help.

Read full topic
